comment.text: The event object passed to the handler function

mdx.rawBody: The event object passed to the handler function

markdownRemark.rawMarkdownBody: The event object passed to the handler function
markdownRemark.html: The event object passed to the handler function

Creates a event handler function throttled by requestAnimationFrame that returns the most recent event. Useful for noisy events that update react state.

function Component() {
  const [position, setPosition] = useState();
  const handleMove = useThrottledEventHandler<React.PointerEvent>(
    (event) => {
      setPosition({
        top: event.clientX,
        left: event.clientY,
      })
    }
  )

  return (
    <div onPointerMove={handleMove}>
       <div style={position} />
    </div>
  );
}
